Description:
Deck 1: Investigators sided with the Lodge
Deck 2: Investigators sided with the Coven, decveived the Lodge AND were inducted into the Circle
Deck 3: If the above is NOT true, investigators sided with the Coven and at least TWO of the following are true: deceiving the Lodge, hiding  knowledge of the Coven, hid mementos
Deck 4: None of the above is true, sided with Coven
Name: Notecard
